name: Improve English Writing Skills
description: How to Improve English Writing Skills  Do you have trouble with punctuation? Are you always using commas instead of full stops? Is your spelling weak? Do you have difficulty filling in forms and writing letters? Then this app (How to Improve English Writing Skills) will help you improve the standard of your written English. It has been written in an easy-to understand way designed for use by anyone. Whether you are a student, school-leaver, foreign student, an employed or self-employed worker or someone at home, it should prove a valuable reference app.  The format is easy to follow with plenty of examples. At the end of each section there are exercises. Suggested answers are at the last (twelve button) of the app. Part 1 to 7 deals with the basic rules of grammar and punctuation identifying the various punctuation marks and showing how each is used. It also covers the parts of speech and demonstrates their uses. Part 8 to 11 shows you how to put Part 1 to 7 into practice. There are sections on essay writing, summarizing, writing reports and even plotting a short story. There are also chapters on letter writing, filling in forms, writing a CV and applying for a job. The use of e-mail has also been incorporated.  Feature of the apps 1. Discovering Grammar  2. Expanding your Knowledge  3. Polishing up your Punctuation  4. Paragraphing your Work  5. Checking your Spelling  6. Looking at Apostrophes and Abbreviations  7. Improving your Style  8.Writing an Essay and a Short Story 9. Summarizing and Reporting  10. Writing Letters  11. Making Applications   12.
